nodes.text: Chirodactyls, also known as Dathomirian bats, were a species of winged carnivorous creatures native to the planet Dathomir. One chirodactyl known as Gorgara was especially notorious among the natives of the planet.

Chirodactyls first appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order, developed by Respawn Entertainment. During development, inspiration for the design of the chirodactyls was found in bats and owls. Chirodactyl concept art was done by artist Jean-Francois Rey.
